title: Form of the Old Man with a Stick

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the start of day 3, players may choose to change their role into Old Man with a Stick. If they do, they're Old Men with Sticks and not their original roles. (Old Man with a Stick is a Town Investigative role that's functionally equivalent to Sheriff.)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Become an Old Man with a Stick and win.

desc:
Post 357
*Be one with time and space and old men with sticks alike.*
